title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti in salted water until al dente, then drain.
In a pan, cook the pancetta or bacon until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk the eggs with grated parmesan and black pepper.
Mix the hot spaghetti with the cooked pancetta, then quickly stir in the egg mixture to create a creamy sauce.
Serve immediately with extra parmesan and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken with yogurt, lemon juice, turmeric, garam masala, cumin, and paprika. Let it sit for at least 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry the chicken until slightly charred and cooked through.
In a pan, melt butter and sauté the onions until soft.
Add garlic, ginger, and crushed tomatoes, then cook until the sauce thickens.
Add the grilled chicken to the sauce and stir in the heavy cream.
Simmer for a few minutes and serve with rice or naan.

title: Chocolate Cake
summary: A rich and moist chocolate cake for dessert lovers.
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C) and grease a cake pan.
In a bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking soda, baking powder, and salt.
Add oil, buttermilk, eggs, and vanilla extract, then mix until smooth.
Gradually add hot water and stir until combined.
Pour the batter into the cake pan and bake for 30-35 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean.
Let the cake cool before serving.
